com.opengamma.strata.market.curve.perturb

Class CurvePointShiftBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opengamma.strata.market.curve.perturb.CurvePointShiftBuilder

  • public final class CurvePointShiftBuilder
extends Object
    Mutable builder for building instances of CurvePointShift.

    This is created via CurvePointShift.builder(ShiftType).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CurvePointShiftBuilder addShift(Object nodeIdentifier, double shiftAmount)
      Adds a shift for a curve node to the builder.
      CurvePointShiftBuilder addShifts(Map<?,Double> shifts)
      Adds multiple shifts to the builder.
      CurvePointShift build()
      Returns an instance of CurvePointShift built from the data in this builder.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • addShift

        public CurvePointShiftBuilder addShift(Object nodeIdentifier,
                                       double shiftAmount)
        Adds a shift for a curve node to the builder.
        Parameters:
        nodeIdentifier - the identifier of the node to which the shift should be applied
        shiftAmount - the size of the shift
        Returns:
        this builder

      • addShifts

        public CurvePointShiftBuilder addShifts(Map<?,Double> shifts)
        Adds multiple shifts to the builder.
        Parameters:
        shifts - the shift amounts, keyed by the identifier of the node to which they should be applied
        Returns:
        this builder

      • build

        public CurvePointShift build()
        Returns an instance of CurvePointShift built from the data in this builder.
        Returns:
        an instance of CurvePointShift built from the data in this builder
